MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA13 postcode area of Kilmacolm. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:56pm. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived onsite and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a fault on our electrical network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:41pm on 11 November 2020
